Going to Contact… Email: anel.tt@gmail.com Settings About
Anel Bazarbayeva is a graduate student pursuing a Master of Science in Computer Science at Pace University in New York, with an expected completion in 2026. She holds both bachelor’s and master’s degrees in Automobile Engineering from Kazakhstan and previously worked as a senior engineer in the energy sector, where she managed technical solutions and data analysis across multiple districts. Her current focus is on software engineering, with growing expertise in Java and database technologies. She has worked on projects involving distributed database design, web applications, and system performance optimization, often bridging her engineering background with computer science practices. Anel is passionate about developing smart, sustainable solutions that enhance urban infrastructure and support the growth of intelligent transportation systems. By combining her technical knowledge with cross-disciplinary experience, she aims to contribute to safer, more efficient, and forward-looking cities.
In my free time, I enjoy running, reading, and cycling, as well as traveling and exploring new places. These hobbies keep me active, balanced, and inspired.
